Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have received attention in the transport sector for use as auxiliary power units or range extenders, due to the high electrical efficiency and fuelling options using existing fuel infra structure.
Titulo: Simulation of a SOFC/Battery powered vehicle

Sentencas: The present work proposes an SOFC/battery powered vehicle using compressed natural gas (CNG), liquefied natural gas (LNG) or liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) as fuels.
Titulo: Simulation of a SOFC/Battery powered vehicle

Sentencas: A model was developed integrating an SOFC into a modified Nissan Leaf Acenta electrical vehicle and considering standardized driving cycles.
Titulo: Simulation of a SOFC/Battery powered vehicle

Sentencas: A 30 L fuel tank and 12 kW SOFC module was simulated, including a partial oxidation fuel reformer.
Titulo: Simulation of a SOFC/Battery powered vehicle

Sentencas: The results show a significant increase of the driving range when combining the battery vehicle with an SOFC.
Titulo: Simulation of a SOFC/Battery powered vehicle

Sentencas: Ranges of 264 km, 705 km and 823 km using respectively CNG, LNG and LPG compared to 170 km performed by the original vehicle were calculated.
Titulo: Simulation of a SOFC/Battery powered vehicle

Sentencas: Furthermore, a thorough sensitivity analysis was carried out.
Titulo: Simulation of a SOFC/Battery powered vehicle
